1. Basso, Keith. 1996. Wisdom sits in places. NM: University of New Mexico Press. ISBN: 0-8263-1724-3

4. Duranti, Alessandro. 2001. Linguistic Anthropology. NY: Cambridge. ISBN: 9780521449939

5. Hoffman, Katherine. 2007. We Share Walls: Language, Land, and Gender in Berber Morocco. Malden, MA: Blackwell. ISBN: 978-1-4051-421-5

6. Shankar, Shalini. 2015. Advertising Diversity: Ad Agencies and the Creation of Asian American Consumers. Durham, NC: Duke University Press. ISBN: 978-0-8223-5877-0

7. Wirtz, Kristina. 2014. Performing Afro Cuba: Image, Voice, and Spectacle in the Making of Race and History. University of Chicago Press. ISBN: 9780226119052
